title: FS: T206 - autographed - sgc/jsa - price reduced
author: cozmokramer

posts.post_title: FS: T206 - autographed - sgc/jsa - price reduced
posts.post_content:
So many have asked if I would sell instead of trade, so I've decided to add prices.  They are for sale or I'm willing to trade for 1950's unopened baseball packs that are PSA graded.

McBride (batting) SGC - $1100
McBride (batting) PSA - $1100
Doyle (throwing) - SOLD
Marquard (hands at side) - SOLD
Livingston SGC - SOLD

[IMG]http://www.247hq.com/T206/MCBRIDE_B57463_B.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.247hq.com/T206/PSA_MCBRIDE_B.jpg[/IMG]
Marquard has sold, the others are available
Price reduction on the few that are left.  Once these are sold they are virtually impossible to replace!
